column3: I'm onto the main event... the food.  All of it was tasty!  We started with the salmon tartare
column4: which was to die for.  Perfectly seasoned and delicious.  I got the steak frites for my main course.  It was cooked to perfection and perfectly seasoned.  We also got the elote to share
column5: which we all loved.  It was just a more upscale version of the classic street food
column6: but the twist on it was perfect.  All in all
column7: I will definitely be back here again.
